value.title: Power BI Desktop, Gateway, DAX - Roundup #36
value.excerpt: In this roundup, we had a bunch of updates for Power BI and Power BI Desktop. This included custom hierarchies, improvements to report design, and a bunch of updates for connectivity. There was an update for the enterprise gateway which included DirectQuery for Oracle and Teradata along with the ability
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fm4Ug0CbcT0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Desktop: How to find the native query after query folding
value.excerpt: Have you wondered how to find the native query in Power BI Desktop after query folding does its thing? Do you even know what query folding is? In this video, Adam looks at how you can find the query that will be sent to your data source and a few things to be aware of. This applies to Power Query in
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/eVDIHG4dflM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Desktop install options (Windows Store vs MSI)
value.excerpt: In this 2 minute Tuesday, we look at the install options for Power BI Desktop. Depending on how you installed it may solve, or create, challenges for you when you need to update. value.title: Power BI Drillthrough Updates
value.excerpt: Did you know there were Power BI drillthrough updates? In this video, Patrick looks at the drillthrough updates in Power BI Desktop. This includes Keep All Filters which will pass the filters on your parent page to the drillthrough page.   LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: Power BI Home Region: What Is It?
value.excerpt: Power BI Home Region: what is it? We look at the home region and look at understanding how it can affect your organization. The Power BI Home region will effect Power BI Premium and could affect your Azure data regions as well. This becomes important when you start looking at Power BI Premium Multi-Geo

value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Data source, Dataset and parameters

value.title: Power BI parameters - Updating in the Power BI Service or with APIs
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can update Power BI parameters within the service or by using APIs. You can create Power BI Parameters within Power BI Desktop using Power Query. Then you can update those Power BI parameters once the report is published to the Power BI service.  PowerShell Samples:

value.title: Power BI Publish to Web can be SCARY!?!
